alert.note: Alert for Clark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 12:44AM EST until February 19 at 7:31AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of Central Ohio and West Central Ohio, including the following counties, in Central Ohio, Fairfield, Fayette OH, Franklin OH, Hocking, Licking, Madison and Pickaway. In West Central Ohio, Clark. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1244 AM EST, local law enforcement and trained spotters reported flooding in the warned area. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Columbus, Springfield, Newark, Dublin, Lancaster, Westerville, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Fairborn, Hilliard, Pickerington, Washington Court House, Worthington, Circleville, Bexley, Heath, London and Logan.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
